TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClrObjectFactory extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IClrObjectFactory

Docs.summary: Activates SOAP-enabled COM+ application proxies from a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ClrObjectFactory is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use the class directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: The name of the assembly to activate.
The name of the type to activate.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the assembly's configuration file.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromMailbox (string Mailbox, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromMailbox(string Mailbox, string Mode) cil managed

Docs.param: A mailbox on the Web service.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the remote assembly's mailbox. Currently not implemented; throws a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Throws an exception if called.

Docs.exception: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is not implemented.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromVroot (string VrootUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromVroot(string VrootUrl, string Mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The virtual root URL of the object to be activated.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the virtual root URL of the remote assembly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CreateFromVroot appends the string "?wsdl" to `VrootUrl` and calls <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClrObjectFactory.CreateFromWsdl%2A> to activate the remote object.
The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. Therefore, CreateFromVroot will not work with most ASMX Web services.
CreateFromVroot requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.
Docs.permission: for the ability to call unmanaged code. Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromWsdl (string WsdlUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromWsdl(string WsdlUrl, string Mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The WSDL URL of the Web service.
Docs.summary: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) of the XML Web service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Processes the WSDL passed in and, if necessary, generates a proxy, then activates the remote object.
The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. Therefore, CreateFromWsdl will not work with most ASMX Web services.
CreateFromWsdl requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.
Docs.permission: for the ability to call unmanaged code. Associated enumeration: .
